attributes.action: Petition to break up the monopolies comission
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that the monopolies comission has a disproportionate control over the policing of market domination

As ironic as this sounds, we believe that this is a serious issue, as the monopoly obtained by the comission allows it to act unilaterally, creating a disgustingly hypocritical situation where the very thing the monopolies commission aims to prevent is exactly what is occurring. We petition the Business Secretary, Dr Vince Cable to consider effecting remedial measures aimed at separating the commission into smaller competing organisations.

Yours Sincerely

The JCR of Somerville College, Oxford
(Alma mater of Baroness Thatcher)
